SmartFieldSpec.Name: Next Transaction Date Delinquency Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Gets the number of days delinquent based on next transaction date.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_NTD_DAYS_DELINQUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select s.ID, dbo.USR_UFN_CALCULATE_NTD_DELINQUENCY(CONVERT(Date,dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GET_NEXT_TRANSACTIONDATE_BY_SPONSORSHIPID(s.ID))) as DaysDelinquent from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s --join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc on soc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
